an4.232:1.1: “Mendicants, I declare these four kinds of deeds, having realized them with my own insight.
an4.232:1.3: There are dark deeds with dark results.
an4.232:1.4: There are bright deeds with bright results.
an4.232:1.5: There are dark and bright deeds with dark and bright results.
an4.232:1.6: There are neither dark nor bright deeds with neither dark nor bright results, which lead to the ending of deeds.
an4.232:1.7: These are the four kinds of deeds that I declare, having realized them with my own insight.”
